name: UPlanMe
tag_list: social-media, entertainment, events, nightlife, restaurants, sports, music, television, shopping
overview:
UPlanMe is a “smart-calendar” platform that provides users with personalized event suggestions, specials and incentives based on their interests in shopping, food, nightlife, sports, music, television and more.

By “unlocking” or opting-into their favorite businesses, sports team, TV shows and musicians, users’ calendars are populated with relevant local specials and events from UPlanMe’s database of 100,000+ events. Users can then share those plans with friends on the UPlanMe platform or invite friends to join-in with them.

Users can also create their own public or private groups and allow others to “unlock” or opt-in to that group. The user can then create group events that are automatically placed on the calendars of those who have opted-in.

Businesses and brands can also take ownership of their public pages through UPlanMe to place their specials and events directly onto the calendars of users who have “unlocked” or opted-in to their business.

UPlanMe’s tagline: Stop Planning. Start Living!
